title: Senhora Synergies Group excels in tea once again
body_lines: Dartry Valley Tea Factory of Senhora Synergies Group continues to showcase their outstanding capabilities in manufacturing premium quality ‘Ceylon Tea’ by achieving yet another all-time record price of Rs. 2,350 per kg for a FBOPF1 in the Western Medium Grown Region at the weekly tea auctions held on 7/8 June 2022.
This line of tea was sold and marketed by Forbes and Walker Tea Brokers Ltd.
